main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Littleton, New Hampshire on December 27, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as circular and the size of a pea,The color of the object was reported as white and emitted no sound,It appeared brighter than Venus but was significantly smaller,The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes and showed a steady course without any maneuvers,The report was from a recognized military officer, increasing its validity.
sighted object: one circular white object in the sky
witness description: Dr. Roy H. Hailing and Dr. Warrington, Vermont
